name: df-dju
body: |- wceq(cdju(c0, c1), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)))
comment: Disjoint union of two classes. This is a way of creating a set which contains elements corresponding to each element of ` A ` or ` B ` , tagging each one with whether it came from ` A ` or ` B ` . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 20-Jun-2022.)
